entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CLR Log initialization happens multiple times per process #85845
  • Ability to disable default http request logging #85840
  • Test failure: Mismatch in align instruction #85839
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'info->m_weight > BB_ZERO_WEIGHT' #85838
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Directory.GetDirectories / Directory.GetFiles IAsyncEnumerable #85835
  • [API Proposal]: File.DeleteAsync(path) #85834
  • [Linux] X509Chain: fails to consistently respect custom trusted roots with same subject #85830
  • Green CI pipeline on a failed run #85824
  • RequiresDynamicCode based on interface implementation #85829
  • [API Proposal]: System.IO.Compression: ZipFile.CreateFromDirectory: Provide overload for writing to stream #85822
  • Mono incorrectly throws a TypeLoadException for a recursive type definition #85821
    8.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Support `PreserveSig` on methods #85816
    8.0.0
  • The working directory log message on app startup #85809
  • [API Proposal]: add more entries to MediaTypeNames #85807
    8.0.0
  • Productize MSTAT files #85806
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Assertion failed 'inVarToRegMap[varIndex] == REG_STK' during 'LSRA allocate' #66579
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!foundMismatch' during 'LSRA allocate' #66580
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'interval->isSpilled' during 'LSRA allocate' #66578
    8.0.0
  • Q: How to build a Metric-based SystemRuntimeMetrics.cs in System.Private.CoreLib that has a dependency on System.Diagnostics.Metrics? #85827
  • Diagnostic port suspension message doesn't report expected port name #75581
    8.0.0
  • Avoid libraries referencing 4.3.x packages #85641
    8.0.0
  • .NET 6 Environment.OSVersion returns compatibility mode version #85758
  • Unexpected PGO schema divergence in a method that's both instrumented and optimized #85799
    8.0.0
  • Possible to ship my application with a local copy of the .NET 7 runtime? #85825
  • IlcGenerateMstatFile doesn't work on MachO architectures (macOS, iOS) #85814
  • Support System.Text.Json on .NET Framework 4.6.1 #85793
  • PublishAot should enable single file safety analyzer #82503
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add StructuredLoggingFormat to StringSyntaxAttribute #84423
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Save some space in the hwintrinsic and instruction tables #85853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/SIMD to a merged test group #85852
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/Performance to a merged test group #85851
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/opt to a merged test group #85850
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/Generics to a merged test group #85849
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `gtNewBlkOpNode` and `lvSimdBaseJitType` #85848
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests to a merged test group #85847
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Restore missing API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • We should not establish a heap hard limit for 32 bit platforms #85844
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Capture remaining binding methods for source generator support #85843
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Misc LSRA throughput improvements #85842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • UnprocessableContent HTTP 422 alias #85841
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Expose various integer intrinsics for Avx512F, Avx512BW, and Avx512CD #85833
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ILLink should keep parameter names for methods which are used to create a delagate #85831
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [DRAFT] try to init less when creating array types #85828
    NO-REVIEW
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - Override KnownWebAssemblySdkPack to 8.0.0-dev #85815
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Skip ProcessStartInfoTests.TestWindowStyle if COM interop is not supported #85813
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Add ToDictionary() overloads for KeyValuePair and ValueTuple kv. #85811
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Get rid of reflection blocked types #85810
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Fold typeof(T).TypeHandle.Value #85804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Use Ubuntu 22.04 for runtime-dev-innerloop #85836
    needs-area-label
  • Disable NativeLibraryTests for ilasm round-trip testing #85832
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, disabled-test
  • [LoongArch64] Implements the CodeGen::genCodeForIncSaturate(). #85502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix Diagnostic port suspension message doesn't report expected port name #85430
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Run NativeAot tests on arm64 #82307
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete the concept of "location" values from local morph #85604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][GC] Use 128gb for regions_range on RISCV64 #84797
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Stop passing around struct handles in importer #85561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove AO from a couple of SpanHelpers methods #85819
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance
  • [browser] prevent <DebuggerSupport> from disabling interp optimizations #85792
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Skip displaying raw instruction bytes by default for non-xarch #85808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: prepare for instrumentation before incorporating profile counts #85805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] modify the define of `FLOAT_REGISTER_SIZE`. #85812
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [mono][interp] Fix first arg offset computation for unoptimized newobj #85787
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2174382 #85802
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] PackedSimd, add floating point methods #85705
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Update mariner images to latest with LLVM 16 #84676
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • CI: Fix running the workaround for `NuGet-Migrations` issue #85692
    area-Infrastructure
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix RVA field access in composite Crossgen2 build (#78723) #85800
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Move `ASG` rationalization to just after global morph #85494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64 - Centralize peephole optimization for removing redundant `mov` instructions #85780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Fix - Do not remove `CAST` nodes on assignment if the `LCL_VAR` is a parameter. #85734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fix GCStress timeouts in JIT/jit64 #85040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Skip FP registers processing if method don't have floating points use #85744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrade System.Reflection.Metadata version #85738
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • JIT: Generalize assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85323
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use unique IL assembly names instead of automatic renaming #85185
    test-enhancement
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2/r2rdump for LA64. #85038
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Transform indirect calls to direct ones in the importer #85197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #85227
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Docs on testing blazor wasm #85455
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change IsolatedStorageFile path for mobile #83380
    area-System.IO, os-android, os-ios
  • Ensure `maxSIMDStructBytes` doesn't report `compVerifyInstructionSetUnusable` #85370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add mono hot reload support for updating parameter name #85796
    area-EnC-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] [browser] fix job queue timespan calculation #85784
    Servicing-consider, needs-area-label, 7.0.x
  • [draft][browser] loader #85730
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix arg alignment issues when mixing with compiled code #85153
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Unify boot config location #85763
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add request metrics to System.Net.Http #85447
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Suppress clang-16 warnings (backport #81573) #84443
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add IPC commands to enable and disable PerfMaps/JitDumps #85801
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add switch: Do not resolve URLs by defaults for XML #84169
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove references to P/Invokes and DllImport from resource strings in ComInterfaceGenerator #85178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 7 #84984
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add Vector128 and PackedSimd support to the jiterpreter; add PackedSimd to the interpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [MONO] Add JIT_CODE_DEBUG_INFO record functionality for Jitdump #85107
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Servicing docs improvements #85731
    documentation, area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't run SDK tests in VS #32300
  • Enable documentation files in GenAPI and API Compat codebase #32296

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet format fails with "Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis, Version=4.6.0.0...'. The system cannot find the file specified." #68115
  • Special handling for InterpolatedStringHandlerAttribute is causing a hang in C# compiler #68110
    C# 12.0

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33705.301 #68119
  • Type of range variable cannot be determined if the query statement is incomplete #68032
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Buildversion override for local deployments #68118
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dependency to x64 SerivceHub vsix #68117
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid waiting on the thread pool when there is no work to do #68114
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Install ServiceHub x64 vsix for integration test #68113
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check language version for inline arrays feature #68109
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Allocate all CSharp.BindingDiagnosticBag instances from a pool. #68108
    Area-Compilers, 17.7

Merged

  • Use client languageId when file path is ambiguous #68010
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged, Next
  • Additional removal of Location allocations #68112
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move a few types related to pattern matching to be structs instead of classes. #68101
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove non-generic BindingDiagnosticBag #68041
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67831
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Add ServiceHub vsix for ARM64 #68099
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Initial support for collection literal spread elements #67942
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • LSP.Range may request beyond length of file #68081
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #68066
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use correct ref-pack versions #67895
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • WIP: Not for review - Merged branch of all perf work. #67730
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid waiting on the thread pool when there is no work to do #68106
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Improve parsing of switch expressions whith missing `}` or `]` #67943
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add `AdditionalTextValueProvider<TValue>` #68092
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Remove need for inheritance in BindingDiagnosticBag #68042
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • IDE1006: Support multiple underscores #68086
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Feature - IDE1006
  • Break cycles in attribute binding #68067
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Finalize testing and implementation around object initializers for inline arrays. #68064
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Use a proper tool bar in Document Outline #68094
    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, untriaged, Navigation-Document Outline

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 UseAuthentication and UserAuthorization ordering not respected when within UseWhen #48098
  • RoutePatternAnalyzer causes stack overflow on C# file with a lot of string operations #48097
  • Default 404 response results in "Your connection to this site isn't secure" error #48096
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #48094
  • Perf regression: mvc #48093
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, fortunes_ef #48092
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly: registering circuit breaker with parameters disables the breaker #48089

Closed

  • can i set logger file encoding when stdoutLogEnabled="true" #48069
  • SignalR android SDK add option to turn off the logs #47850
  • Angular project has a broken dependency upon creation. (Broken template) #44776
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct, ApiCrudGetProductDetails, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #47787
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #48060
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #48061
  • SignalR.Npm.FunctionalTests.npmproj fail on Fedora 37+ #48040
  • High number of SignalR requests compared with rest of application #48080
  • get the route name given an http method & uri #48034
  • How to add a client certificate in a SocketsHttpHandler? #47988
  • [JsonIgnore] not working with EF Core types when requesting single resource when Lazy Loading is enabled (.NET 5) #31396
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Node 18 (LTS) #48087
    area-infrastructure
  • Use ObjectCreationHandling.Populate in gRPC JSON transcoding #48084
    area-grpc
  • Ensure DataProtection can be used in trimmed apps. #48082
    area-dataprotection

Merged

  • improve code by is pattern matching #48095
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2174675 #48091
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `0bdaac5` to `a358018` #48086
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Skip more OS's for AOT tests #48090
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • Fix SupportedRuntimeIdentifiers substitution in Directory.Build.targets.in. #48022
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `cb12cf5` to `9af2053` #48085
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Make EndpointHtmlRenderer track the HttpContext #48088
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Fix Fetch + Cookies when using Node 18+ #48076
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • http.sys (7.0 backport): new option for response buffering #48073
    area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • http.sys (6.0 backport): new option for response buffering #48072
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix HTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #47950
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add MediaTypeHeaderValue parsing overloads accepting IList of StringSegment #48035
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix HTTP/3 and HTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #47949
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Add analyzer/codefixer to use AddAuthorizationBuilder #47428
    area-security, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Skip counter measurement when start listening while processing #48045
    area-runtime
  • Add IAcceptsMetadata to RDG #47942
    area-runtime, feature-rdg
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #47845
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate RequestBody for parameters when disabledInferredBody is true #47807
    Servicing-approved, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 7.0.x
  • Testing updated install scripts #47951
    area-infrastructure, area-commandlinetools, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • http.sys: short-circuit empty writes (if we've started) #48071
    area-runtime
  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #47731
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RadioButton application-level Style not working with ControlTemplate on iOS #14949
  • Is it possible to use local notifications? #14946
  • OnNavigatedTo() Object Parameter is NULL after Shell.Current.GoToAsync() call, ONLY happens on Android #14944
  • Always have to close and restart VS between each new change #14943
  • MAUI Images not loading in VS 2022 17.5 - works in 17.4 (Unpackaged on Windows) #14942
  • Inability to target or inspect MAUI elements by content-desc property #14940
  • Webview reloads initial url when app resumes on Android #14939
  • StrokeDashArray of border control only works with StrokeDashOffset != 0 #14938

Closed

  • Android x:Boolean Exception Only In Release Referencing Class Library as PackageReference #14790
  • MacCatalyst - Menu items are lost when creating new windows and returning to previous windows. #14178
    Backlog
  • [iOS] ScrollView's ContentSize and ScrollX changes when the device is rotated multiple times #6499
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Child controls of the grid are automatically resizing, with the size changes of parent Grid #6999
    Backlog
  • RemainingItemsThreshold not working on Windows #12066
    Backlog
  • RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand inside CollectionView does not get triggered on windows platform #9935
    Backlog
  • CollectionView RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand Invalid #8338
    Backlog
  • Auto theme change doesn't behave as expected on .NET 7 whereas the same works fine on .NET 6 #11299
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Button Set Glyph with converter or datatrigger #12629
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Dev/update mappers #14948

Merged

  • Updated info around the Task return type #14937
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView.RemainingItemsThresholdReached #14391
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, backport/suggested
  • Clarify ISafeAreaView docs #14934

Updated

  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • [android] reduce interop calls in MauiDrawable #14933
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • feat: adding IWindowCreator #14921
    community ✨
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Use default SmallChange value for WinUI slider #14912
    area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Changes updating ImageButton Padding to avoid size issues #14905
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sentinel not generated for enums on Optimize-DbContext #30832

Closed

  • Update many to many relationship by using skip navigation properties. #30798
  • Crash in libsqlite3-0 related to topology suite #30805

PullRequests

Created

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-05
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #16325
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2174681 #16135
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #16330
